MC2SimpleString Class Reference

Helper class to use when sending a lot of strings around and avoidance of ownership problems are to be avoided without having to use the more advanced functionality supplied by MC2String. More...

#include <MC2SimpleString.h>

Detailed Description

Helper class to use when sending a lot of strings around and avoidance of ownership problems are to be avoided without having to use the more advanced functionality supplied by MC2String.
